title: How to use mapVismodule
text: colorpen‚Äôs mapVisModule uses leaflet visualize map markers location data provided. article, ‚Äôll use accident dataset datatoys article based 0.0.1 Version.

title: How to use mapVismodule
text: colorpen‚Äôs module assumes used Shiny application. can use snippet(type shinyapp) build basic shiny application. application show nothing. let‚Äôs add mapVisModule ui also, mapVisModule server. final (basic) code like . notice 2 things. id ui server . inputData server format reactive
code: library(shiny)  ui <- fluidPage(   )  server <- function(input, output, session) {    }  shinyApp(ui, server) ui <- fluidPage(   mod_mapVisModule_ui(     id = 'MapModule'   ) ) server <- function(input, output, session) {   mod_mapVisModule_server(     id = "MapModule",     inputData = reactive(datatoys::accident)   ) } library(shiny)  ui <- fluidPage(   mod_mapVisModule_ui(     id = 'MapModule'   ) )  server <- function(input, output, session) {   mod_mapVisModule_server(     id = "MapModule",     inputData = reactive(datatoys::accident) # remotes::install_github('statgarten/datatoys')   ) }  shinyApp(ui, server) # run application

title: How to use mapVismodule
text: mapVisModule consisted Result Area Control Area using flow. Declare module (already) Set Longitude (X) Latitude (Y) column data Set additional option (like marker size) Draw.

title: How to use mapVismodule
text: Let‚Äôs change X Y like image   also can change additional options note , use group marker option. color column alpha make effect. (modify version colorpen)  information leaflet functions, visit page. issue suggestion, please make issue colorpen‚Äôs github.

title: How to use mosaicmodule
text: colorpen‚Äôs mosaicModule uses ggmosaic generate mosaic plot. article, ‚Äôll use fly dataset ggmosaic package. article based 0.0.4 Version.

title: How to use mosaicmodule
text: colorpen‚Äôs module assumes used Shiny application. can use snippet(type shinyapp) build basic shiny application. application show nothing. let‚Äôs add mosaicModule ui also, mosaicModule server. Note , didn‚Äôt declare inputData yet. final (basic) code like . notice 2 things. id ui server . inputData server format reactive
code: library(shiny)  ui <- fluidPage(   )  server <- function(input, output, session) {    }  shinyApp(ui, server) ui <- fluidPage(   mod_mosaicModule_ui('mosaicModule_1') ) server <- function(input, output, session) {   colorpen::mod_mosaicModule_server('mosaicModule_1', inputData) } library(shiny) library(ggmosaic) # for fly dataset library(dplyr) # for pipe  ui <- fluidPage(   colorpen::mod_mosaicModule_ui('mosaicModule_1') )  server <- function(input, output, session) {      flights <- fly  %>%     filter(!is.na(do_you_recline), !is.na(rude_to_recline))      inputData <- reactive({flights})   colorpen::mod_mosaicModule_server('mosaicModule_1', inputData) }  shinyApp(ui, server)

title: How to use mosaicmodule
text: pairModule consisted Result Area Control Area using flow. Declare module (already) Set columns data visualize Draw. information leaflet functions, visit page. issue suggestion, please make issue colorpen‚Äôs github.

title: How to use pairmodule
text: colorpen‚Äôs pairModule uses GGally visualize pair-level plot. article, ‚Äôll use mtcars dataset. article based 0.0.4 Version.

title: How to use pairmodule
text: colorpen‚Äôs module assumes used Shiny application. can use snippet(type shinyapp) build basic shiny application. application show nothing. let‚Äôs add pairModule ui also, pairModule server. Note , didn‚Äôt declare inputData yet. final (basic) code like . notice 2 things. id ui server . inputData server format reactive
code: library(shiny)  ui <- fluidPage(   )  server <- function(input, output, session) {    }  shinyApp(ui, server) ui <- fluidPage(   mod_pairModule_ui('pairModule_1') ) server <- function(input, output, session) {   colorpen::mod_pairModule_server('pairModule_1', inputData) } library(shiny)  ui <- fluidPage(   mod_mapVisModule_ui(     id = 'MapModule'   ) )  server <- function(input, output, session) {   inputData <- reactive({mtcars}) ## THIS CODE ADDED   colorpen::mod_pairModule_server('pairModule_1', inputData) }  shinyApp(ui, server) # run application

title: How to use pairmodule
